shlokas:
geeta-shastram idam punyam 
yah pathet prayatah puman 
vishnoh padam-avaapnoti 
bhaya shokaadi varjitah ||1||

geetadhyayana sheelasya 
pranayaam parasya cha 
naiva santi he paapaani 
poorva-janma-kritaani cha ||2||

mal-nirmochanam punsaam 
jalasnaanam dine dine 
sakrud-geetaambhasi snaanam 
sansara-mal-nashanam ||3||

geeta sugeeta kartavyaa 
kimanyaih shaastra-vistaraih 
yaa swayam padmanaabhasya 
mukha-padmaadvinih-srutaa ||4||

bharataamruta-sarvasvam  
vishnorvaktraa-dvinih srutam
geetaa gangodakam peetvaa 
punarjanma na vidyate||5||

sarvopanishado gaavo 
dogdha gopalanandanah 
paartho vatsah sudheerbhoktaa 
dugdham geetamrutam mahat ||6||

ekam shastram devakeeputra geetam 
eko devo devakeeputra eva 
eko mantrastasya naamani yaani 
karmaapyekam tasya devasya sevaa ||7||
